description: This file contains utility functions for processing images and converting JSON schemas into types.Schema objects, as well as formatting function definitions for external tools, specifically in the context of Google GenAI types.

methods.name: format_image_for_message
methods.description: Converts an Image object into a dictionary suitable for messaging, handling URLs, local files, and byte content.

methods.name: convert_schema
methods.description: Recursively converts a JSON-like schema dictionary into a types.Schema object, resolving references and handling various schema types.

methods.name: format_function_definitions
methods.description: Formats a list of tool definitions into a Google GenAI Tool object with function declarations.
